content:
Yes, Nigeria has a diverse music scene with several unique and talented upcoming artists. Here are some of the best upcoming artists to listen to:

1. Oxlade: Oxlade is a talented singer and songwriter with a unique voice and style. He has gained traction in the Nigerian music scene with his hit songs "Away" and "O2".

2. Tems: Tems is a talented singer and songwriter who has been making waves in the Nigerian music scene. Her unique sound blends afrobeats, R&B, and soul music.

3. Fireboy DML: Fireboy DML is a talented singer who first gained recognition with his hit single "Jealous". He has since released other hit songs such as "Scatter" and "Vibration".

4. Omah Lay: Omah Lay is a fast-rising artist in the Nigerian music scene. His debut EP "Get Layd" received critical acclaim, and his unique blend of afrobeats and R&B has gained him a massive following.

5. CKay: CKay is a talented singer, producer, and songwriter who has worked with several top Nigerian artists. He released his debut EP "CKay the First" in 2019, and it received critical acclaim.

These upcoming artists are sure to give you a taste of Nigeria's vibrant and dynamic music scene. Happy exploring!
